items.title: US Coast Guard actively pursuing another sanctioned vessel: Official
items.description: The Coast Guard also seized an oil tanker off the coast of Venezuela Saturday.

items.title: Moscow car bomb kills Russian general, investigators say
items.description: A car bomb killed a Russian general in Moscow early on Monday morning, the Investigative Committee of Russia said in a statement.

items.title: WATCH:  Alleged shoplifter pulls gun on officer inside Walmart store
items.description: An alleged shoplifter is charged with attempted murder after pulling a gun on a police officer Thursday at a Walmart store in Canton, Ohio.

items.title: WATCH:  Scuba-diving Santa Claus takes a holiday plunge in the Florida Keys
items.description: Santa encountered an array of sea life as he traded his sleigh for scuba gear on Sunday, making a holiday appearance beneath the waves of the Florida ...

items.title: ICE agent fires shots at man after being hit by SUV
items.description: The man also bit an ICE agent as officers subdued him outside his apartment.
